reviewText: I was ready to turn this off a few times, but am glad I didn't.  After you see stop trying to keep track of all the people, you'll notice some regulars and become more interested in their particular stories.  I loved that there were so many creative uses of 3 inches highlighted in the film, not to mention the cliches such as some guy using it to increase the length of his member (not terribly important).  It's sad and funny and weird.  Enjoy!
